definition: the smallest discrete quantity of some physical property that a system can possess, according to quantum theory
details:
noun
- the smallest discrete quantity of some physical property that a system can possess, according to quantum theory
= example: the smallest discrete quantity of some physical property that a system can possess, according to quantum theory
- a discrete amount of something that is analogous to the quantities in quantum theory
= example: a discrete amount of something that is analogous to the quantities in quantum theory
